name: ØNCE UPØN A T1M3 1N NAGANØ by Ev Tchebotarev

metadata.name: ØNCE UPØN A T1M3 1N NAGANØ #1
metadata.description: ØNCE UPØN A T1M3 1N NAGANØ is a special companion piece to the original edition of Once Upon A Time In Nagano $TSUMAGOJUKU, now reimagined thanks to a collaboration with digital pixel artists @aleha_84. This work has been lovingly hand-crafted and animated. We worked together to create a unique and long-lasting piece to immerse into an alternative world. This is a limited edition of 100, with matching editions airdropped to long-time supporters and holders.
